module.name: cvzStackExample
module.description: A simple example/tutorial about the implementation of a CVZ model composed of several maps using the cvzStack class.
module.copypolicy: Released under the terms of the GNU GPL v2.0
module.description-long:
This module is designed to act as a tutorial for building up a CVZ model composed of several convergence zones linked up together. This can be achieved using an XML application running several instance of the cvzCore module, or using a single module instantiating the cvzStack class, as presented in this example.
The following example is simply building a 3 components system linking one camera with the proprioception of the head.
